member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Testing.TestUtils.WithScheduler(System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler)
member.summary: WithScheduler overrides the default Deferred and Taskpool schedulers with the given scheduler until the return value is disposed. This is useful in a unit test runner to force RxXaml objects to schedule via a TestScheduler object.
member.returns: An object that when disposed, restores the previous default schedulers.

member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Testing.TestUtils.With``1(System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler,System.Func{System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler,``0})
member.summary: With is an extension method that uses the given scheduler as the default Deferred and Taskpool schedulers for the given Func. Use this to initialize objects that store the default scheduler (most RxXaml objects).
member.returns: The return value of the function.

member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Testing.TestUtils.With(System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler,System.Action{System.Reactive.Concurrency.IScheduler})
member.summary: With is an extension method that uses the given scheduler as the default Deferred and Taskpool schedulers for the given Action.

member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Testing.TestUtils.With``1(Microsoft.Reactive.Testing.TestScheduler,System.Func{Microsoft.Reactive.Testing.TestScheduler,``0})
member.summary: With is an extension method that uses the given scheduler as the default Deferred and Taskpool schedulers for the given Func. Use this to initialize objects that store the default scheduler (most RxXaml objects).
member.returns: The return value of the function.

member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Testing.TestUtils.With(Microsoft.Reactive.Testing.TestScheduler,System.Action{Microsoft.Reactive.Testing.TestScheduler})
member.summary: With is an extension method that uses the given scheduler as the default Deferred and Taskpool schedulers for the given Action.

member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Testing.TestUtils.WithMessageBus(Microsoft.Reactive.Testing.TestScheduler,ReactiveUI.IMessageBus)
member.summary: WithMessageBus allows you to override the default Message Bus implementation until the object returned is disposed. If a message bus is not specified, a default empty one is created.
member.param: The message bus to use, or null to create a new one using the default implementation.
member.returns: An object that when disposed, restores the original message bus.

member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Testing.TestUtils.RunToMilliseconds(Microsoft.Reactive.Testing.TestScheduler,System.Double)
member.summary: RunToMilliseconds moves the TestScheduler to the specified time in milliseconds.
member.param: The time offset to set the TestScheduler to, in milliseconds. Note that this is *not* additive or incremental, it sets the time.

member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Testing.TestUtils.OnNextAt``1(Microsoft.Reactive.Testing.TestScheduler,System.Double,``0)
member.summary: OnNextAt is a method to help create simulated input Observables in conjunction with CreateHotObservable or CreateColdObservable.
member.param: The time offset to fire the notification on the recorded notification.
member.returns: A recorded notification that can be provided to TestScheduler.CreateHotObservable.

member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Testing.TestUtils.OnErrorAt``1(Microsoft.Reactive.Testing.TestScheduler,System.Double,System.Exception)
member.summary: OnErrorAt is a method to help create simulated input Observables in conjunction with CreateHotObservable or CreateColdObservable.
member.param: The time offset to fire the notification on the recorded notification.
The exception to terminate the Observable with.
member.returns: A recorded notification that can be provided to TestScheduler.CreateHotObservable.

member.name: M:ReactiveUI.Testing.TestUtils.OnCompletedAt``1(Microsoft.Reactive.Testing.TestScheduler,System.Double)
member.summary: OnCompletedAt is a method to help create simulated input Observables in conjunction with CreateHotObservable or CreateColdObservable.
member.param: The time offset to fire the notification on the recorded notification.
member.returns: A recorded notification that can be provided to TestScheduler.CreateHotObservable.
